original_title: DEAD OR ZOMBIE ゾンビが発生しようとも、ボクたちは自己評価を変えない
overview: Set in a provincial city that has been quarantined to prevent the spread of infection after a zombie outbreak, this human drama depicts the new daily life of a high school girl who remains in the quarantine area to take care of her family who have become zombies. (machine translation)
tagline: With or without zombies, we will never change our self-assessment
title: Dead or Zombie
